## ProvingParams type

Params for generation of proof for auth circuit

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ProvingParams = {
    dataPreparer: DataPrepareHandlerFunc;
    provingKey: Uint8Array;
    wasm: Uint8Array;
};
```
